name: NEURO.OS
description: NEURO.OS (Medical + Dev Edition). Visual Identity: 'MRI Scan' / Sterile Laboratory. Palette: Void Black, Neon Cyan, Surgical Green, Med Blue. Designed for FREITAS.LAB content.

design_system.philosophy: Sterile Dark Mode / MRI Aesthetic. Clinical precision, cold tones, high-contrast data visualization.

ui_mechanics.tech_grid: Grid architecture resembling medical imaging sheets.
